overview: Look both ways because Falcon’s hottest studs are about to flip out as they learn the value of a little ‘Give and Take’! From award-winning director Steve Cruz, this flip-fucking spectacular shows six of the industry’s hottest versatile performers as they take to their luxurious Southern California homes for brand-new unscripted hookups that has each and every one of these mouthwatering men utilizing their holes and poles.
title: Give and Take
